attributes.action: Create John Wick a Knight of the Realm for his devoted service to the British Electorate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having made available the details of MP's expenses John has enabled the British Electorate to better understand how money has all to often come well in front of integrity in the life of politics

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
